scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -g d3-quadtree:d3,d3-scale:d3,lodash:lodash -n d3 -o build/d3-cluster.js -- index.js
scripts.test: TZ=America/Los_Angeles tape 'test/**/*-test.js' && eslint index.js src test
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-cluster.js -c -m -o build/d3-cluster.min.js
